name: scrattino2
description: Scratch2 offline editor extension for Arduino

scripts.pack:mac:
npm run clean:osx && electron-packager ./app ${npm_package_config_app} --platform darwin --arch x64 --app-copyright='Yengawa Lab
Released under the MIT license' --out=./dist/osx --icon=./assets/osx/scrattino.icns --no-prune && npm run copy:osx
scripts.pack:win:
npm run clean:win && .\node_modules\.bin\electron-packager .\app %npm_package_config_app% --platform win32 --arch all --out=.\dist\win --app-copyright='Yengawa Lab
Released under the MIT license' --icon=.\assets\win\scrattino.ico --no-prune && npm run copy:win

author: yokobond
